Docs.param: The virtual path to the service.
Docs.summary: Ensures that a service is activated at the provided virtual path.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used by third-party transport developers to activate the service at the provided virtual path if that service is not already active. This method is idempotent so that once it has been called, calling it again with the same `virtualPath` specified is safe in the sense that it has no effect.
The expected virtual path format is `/<app-name>/<sub-directory/<service-name>.svc` or `~/<sub-directory/<service-name>.svc` where `<app-name>` is the application name, `<sub-directory>` is the IIS virtual directory, and `<service-name>` is the service name.
